dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: As I was saying, there has been an enormous increase in violent crimes in our town.

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: In fact, the last census showed an astonishing 80% increase in registered offenders in the last year. It's pretty much out of control.

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: But I suppose I shouldn't be surprised. The unemployment rate has been steadily climbing for the past few years.
